author: timbeiko
content:
I left a comment on the ACDE agenda re: reviewing the Glamsterdam PFI'd EIPs: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1687#issuecomment-3225849734

It would be good to align on when/how to do it, so that EIP champions can prepare accordingly and we don't distract client teams from the current priorities.

Would appreciate client teams could chime in with their preferences on the agenda in advance of Thursday's call ðŸ™‚
